about_the_game:
"Deep Space Shadow" is an abstract first-person horror game that I independently completed, including art, sound effects, voice acting, and programming. The game is filled with light exploration content, allowing players to freely explore levels, use bugs (features) and normal methods to clear stages, and explore different paths.

Players take on the role of a journalist with an insatiable thirst for the truth. Upon unexpectedly learning about a missing scientist, you drive to the outskirts alone to uncover the truth hidden in the darkness. Facing puzzles and challenges, you have multiple ways to progress, find, and use your tools and weapons, defeat bosses, overcome fear, and escape alive.

An Eerie Journey Step by Step
Throughout the game, players will encounter various types of boss battles, requiring courage and intelligence to overcome them.



Combining Fun and Challenges
Stranded in an abandoned cabin, players will come across different types of minigames to alleviate tension and can use the resources obtained from these minigames to tackle subsequent challenges.



Uncover Hidden Truths
In this non-linear game, players must collect various notes and videotapes that will gradually unveil the story hidden in the darkness...And each tape unlocks additional minigames


■ A Miniature Sandbox Experience with Multiple Endings and Branches.
■ Interact with the Game World through Tactile and Physical Mechanics.
■ Scavenge Resources to Aid in Your Survival.
■ Multiple Problem-Solving Approaches in a Non-Linear Storyline.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11, 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 or AMD FX 8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
